lead_paragraph: South Korea's former short track world champion Noh Jin-kyu has died of cancer, the Korea Skating Union said on Monday. He was 23.

headline.print_headline: Former Short Track World Champion Noh Dies Aged 23
headline.main: Former Short Track World Champion Noh Dies Aged 23
